refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: euclid-g converts the specified euclid_file to a BRL-CAD database.g file. The euclid_file is expected to be an ASCII file format that is the "decoded" version of the Euclid file. The decoded file represents each object as a series of polygonal faces. Each face may be one of either a simple face (no holes), a complex face (contains at least one hole), or a simple hole. This converter creates a region for each object ID number by unioning together all the objects with the same ID number.

listitem.para: sets tolerance (units of mm); default value is 0.0005

sets input file name; default is to take standard input
sets output file name; default file name is euclid.g
